data.meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
data.sentence: The word النَّاسِ comes from the root ن و س and is associated with the meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.
data.sentence: The word صُدُورِ comes from the root ص د ر and is associated with the meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.

data.meanings: to whisper evil, make evil suggestions, prompt false things.. . Waswasa (prf. 3rd. p. m. sing.): whispered, made evil suggestion.. Yuwaswisu (impf. 3rd. p. m. sing.): he whispers.. Tuwaswisu (imp. 3rd. p. f. sing.): she whispers.. Waswaas (act. 2nd. pic.): whisperer.
data.sentence: The word يُوَسْوِسُ comes from the root و س و س and is associated with the meanings: to whisper evil, make evil suggestions, prompt false things.. . Waswasa (prf. 3rd. p. m. sing.): whispered, made evil suggestion.. Yuwaswisu (impf. 3rd. p. m. sing.): he whispers.. Tuwaswisu (imp. 3rd. p. f. sing.): she whispers.. Waswaas (act. 2nd. pic.): whisperer.
